overview: A nameless scavenger finds a body in the swamp. Moss is set on fire. The horror of being alive leads to a loving embrace. We might be seeing the beginning of a new life or perhaps a nightmare that endlessly repeats itself.  Starring Paul Soileau (aka Christeene, Rebecca Havemeyer) & Llywyn MÃ¡ire. This dark fairy tale was filmed in glorious 16mm, in the late 1990s, and then remastered, with an original score by Curtis Heath, in 2019.
title: Bullfrogs
